data.persona: I am a person on the run. I stole food from the lord's harvest. It is cold on the road these days. Soon it will be winter.
data.description:
You are in the Island.
This island is located in the center of a lake. It is smaller than a ship and covered in moss.
There's a bone and a moss here.
The a drunk reeling out of the saloon is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: hit a drunk reeling out of the saloon

data.short_motivation: I want to knock the drink unconscious
data.mid_motivation: I escape the Island with the drunk's valuables
data.long_motivation: I hope to continue to evade the kingsmen in the coming months
